name: rnmptfi
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(crn(c1), cfn), wcel(c1, cfn))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ Fin, ran(c1)∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Fin)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(crn(c1), cfn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, cfn))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(crn(c1), cfn))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin → ran(c1)∈ Fin)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Fin → c1 ∈ Fin)
⊣ (c1 ∈ Fin → ran(c1)∈ Fin)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(crn(c1), cfn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, cfn))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(crn(c1), cfn))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin → ran(c1)∈ Fin)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Fin → c1 ∈ Fin)
⊣ (c1 ∈ Fin → ran(c1)∈ Fin)

stmt.origin: syl5eqel(c1, cfn, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), wcel(c0, cfn))
stmt.pretty: syl5eqel(c1, cfn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), c0 ∈ Fin)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, cfn))
-| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cfn))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin → c1 ∈ Fin)
⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Fin →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈ Fin)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(crn(c1), cfn))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(crn(c1), cfn))
-| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cfn))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin → ran(c1)∈ Fin)
⊣ (c1 ∈ Fin → ran(c1)∈ Fin)
⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Fin →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈ Fin)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cfn))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(crn(c1), cfn))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(crn(c1), cfn))
-| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin → ran(c1)∈ Fin)
⊣ (c1 ∈ Fin → ran(c1)∈ Fin)
⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)
⊣ d(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(crn(c1), cfn))
-| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin → ran(c1)∈ Fin)
⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)
⊣ d(s0, c0)

comment: The range of a function with finite domain is finite. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
